sense.gloss: concealing one's talents, status, intentions, etc., maintaining a strict incognito, self-effacement
the last day of the year, New Year's Eve
to conceal (oneself), to hide, to abscond
to deceive, to dissemble, to fool
to be dazzled by, to be dizzied by, to be disoriented by
to be lost in (greed, lust, etc.)
concealing one's talents, position, status, intentions, etc.
the world is covered in darkness, all is plunged into darkness

sdata.j: トムは↑元気↑↓げんき↓を↑取↑↓と↓り↑戻↑↓もど↓した。そして、やっぱり、↑大晦日↑↓おおみそか↓にはびっこを↑引↑↓ひ↓きながらもパーティーに↑参加↑↓さんか↓できた。
sdata.e: Tom took heart and, sure enough, on New Year's Eve he was able to hobble along to a party.

sdata.j: ↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓では↑大晦日↑↓おおみそか↓に↑蕎麦↑↓そば↓を↑食↑↓た↓べる↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓があります。
sdata.e: There is a custom of eating buckwheat noodles on New Year's Eve in Japan.

sdata.j: ↑大晦日↑↓おおみそか↓には↑悪霊↑↓あくりょう↓がこの↑世↑↓よ↓に↑戻↑↓もど↓ってくると↑信↑↓しん↓じられていました。
sdata.e: It was believed that evil spirits would return to earth on the last day of the year.

sdata.j: ↑大晦日↑↓おおみそか↓には↑何↑↓なに↓か↑特別↑↓とくべつ↓かことをするの？
sdata.e: Are you doing anything special for New Year's Eve?

sdata.j: トムはメアリーと↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑大晦日↑↓おおみそか↓を↑過↑↓す↓ごしたかった。
sdata.e: Tom wanted to spend New Year's Eve with Mary.

sdata.j: ↑大晦日↑↓おおみそか↓は↑友達↑↓ともだち↓と↑過↑↓す↓ごしました。
sdata.e: I spent New Year's Eve with some of my friends.

sdata.j: ↑叔父↑↓おじ↓さんたち、↑大晦日↑↓おおみそか↓は↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓で↑過↑↓す↓ごすんだって。↑羨↑↓うらや↓まし↑過↑↓す↓ぎる......。
sdata.e: My uncles will spend New Year's Eve in Japan. If envy could kill...

sdata.j: あの↑時↑↓とき↓は↑大晦日↑↓おおみそか↓↑前↑↓まえ↓だった。
sdata.e: That time was before New Year's Eve.

words.gloss: concealing one's talents, status, intentions, etc., maintaining a strict incognito, self-effacement
